front.title: Interoperability Report for Forwarding and Control Element Separation (ForCES)

abstract.t: This document captures results of the second Forwarding and Control Element Separation (ForCES) interoperability test which took place on February 24-25, 2011 in the Internet Technology Lab (ITL) of Zhejiang Gongshang University, China. The document is an update to RFC 6053, which captured the results of the first ForCES interoperability test.
